title: deeplabcut.triangulate
body:
Hello my name is Alberto, today i would like to request help with the followed problem, but first i will describe it *My Operating system and DeepLabCut version** Ubuntu 20.04 LTS, with an Anaconda Env, & deeplabcut 2.1.8.2 Please complete the following information about your system: OS: [Ubuntu 20.04 LTS] Deeplabcut 2.1.8.2 Anaconda env used: **Describe the problem** In this moment i am working with 3D DeepLabCut, so i followed the instructions (https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/a3ff917fc04ae0199b051b1d0cc2f75c3700191a/docs/Overviewof3D.md ) ,everything was going fine until, i run the next command: ### **_deeplabcut.triangulate('/home/dell1/Desktop/DeepLabCut1/Project1-NameofLabele1r-2020-08-25-3d/config.yaml', '/home/dell1/Desktop/DeepLabCut1/Project1-NameofLabele1r-2020-08-25-3d', filterpredictions=False)_** It is important to say, that i have my videos ready, so would like to ask for help. because when i type the previous command i get the next answer from deeplabcut Please place code inside this:
In [11]: deeplabcut.triangulate('/home/dell1/Desktop/DeepLabCut1/Project1-NameofLabele1r-2020-08-25-3d/config.yaml', '/home/dell1/Desktop/DeepL ...: abCut1/Project1-NameofLabele1r-2020-08-25-3d', filterpredictions=False) Strange naming convention on your part. Respect. --------------------------------------------------------------------------- UnboundLocalError Traceback (most recent call last) in ----> 1 deeplabcut.triangulate('/home/dell1/Desktop/DeepLabCut1/Project1-NameofLabele1r-2020-08-25-3d/config.yaml', '/home/dell1/Desktop/DeepLabCut1/Project1-NameofLabele1r-2020-08-25-3d', filterpredictions=False) ~/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/pose_estimation_3d/triangulation.py in triangulate(config, video_path, videotype, filterpredictions, filtertype, gputouse, destfolder, save_as_csv) 95 if isinstance(video_path, str)==True: 96 flag=True ---> 97 video_list = auxiliaryfunctions_3d.get_camerawise_videos(video_path,cam_names,videotype=videotype) 98 else: 99 video_list = video_path ~/anaconda3/envs/DLC-GPU/lib/python3.7/site-packages/deeplabcut/utils/auxiliaryfunctions_3d.py in get_camerawise_videos(path, cam_names, videotype) 131 putativecam2name=os.path.join(path,pref+cam_names[1]+suf+ending) 132 #print([os.path.join(path,pref+cam+suf+ending),putativecam2name]) --> 133 if os.path.isfile(putativecam2name): 134 #found a pair!!! 135 video_list.append([os.path.join(path,pref+cam+suf+ending),putativecam2name]) UnboundLocalError: local variable 'putativecam2name' referenced before assignment

[Please copy/paste the full terminal output of the error here!!!]

**How to Reproduce the problem** import deeplabcut import os from pathlib import Path config_path3d=os.path.join(os.getcwd(),'Project1-NameofLabele1r-2020-08-25-3d/config.yaml') print(config_path3d) deeplabcut.calibrate_cameras('/home/dell1/Desktop/DeepLabCut1/Project1-NameofLabele1r-2020-08-25-3d/config.yaml', cbrow=7, cbcol=7, calibrate=False, alpha=0.9) deeplabcut.calibrate_cameras('/home/dell1/Desktop/DeepLabCut1/Project1-NameofLabele1r-2020-08-25-3d/config.yaml', cbrow=7, cbcol=7, calibrate=True, alpha=0.9) import matplotlib %matplotlib inline deeplabcut.check_undistortion('/home/dell1/Desktop/DeepLabCut1/Project1-NameofLabele1r-2020-08-25-3d/config.yaml', cbrow=7, cbcol=7) **Screenshots** ![DeeplabcutTRingulation](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/68699532/92812586-2975b000-f385-11ea-95f5-ca7972166987.jpg)
